page.title: 07PARK SOUTH EAST SWINDON
page.content: In Park South shopping area there is a stone showing that the centre was built in 1962.Tere is a school which has a main building and huts.The {church}is by the block of six houses.At the back is a big garden.The lake has a{waterfall,grass,trees and a {park}around it.Including the school there are two play areas.Down the road from Queens Drive Church is the {community centre. I thought the Park South area was {tatty}.The shopping centre is big but tatty,there is{graffiti}all over the windows and walls.The area is{closed {in}and{scruffy}.The roads are long and {narrow}and the gardens are very {small}.Some houses are neat because they have been bought and you have permission to add extra walls and porches.
